name: AWS Bedrock Chat Model
natural_language_description: 这是 AWS Bedrock Chat Model 节点。主要用于: Language Model AWS Bedrock

notice.displayName: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: This node must be connected to an AI chain. Insert one

modelSource.name: modelSource
modelSource.description: Choose between on-demand foundation models or inference profiles
modelSource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model Source | 作用: Choose between on-demand foundation models or inference profiles | 默认值: onDemand
available_options: On-Demand Models (值: onDemand) - Standard foundation models with on-demand pricing
Inference Profiles (值: inferenceProfile) - Cross-region inference profiles (required for models like Claude Sonnet 4 and others)

model.name: model
model.description: The inference profile which will generate the completion. Learn more.
model.natural_language_description: 参数名: Model | 作用: The inference profile which will generate the completion. Learn more.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: maxTokensToSample (值: None) - The maximum number of tokens to generate in the completion
temperature (值: None) - Controls randomness: Lowering results in less random completions. As the temperature approaches zero, the model will become deterministic and repetitive.

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.completion || upstream.text || upstream.content || upstream } }
